channel.title: Blogs on Eli's Web Design Business
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Eli's Web Design Business

item.title: Now Hiring
item.description: We are now hiring! With high growth, we are seeking independent contractors to help keep up with continued demand for our websites. We will gladly pay $85.00 per static website built. Developers must know how to make a website with HTML, CSS, and JS. Knowledge of Hugo is not required but will make for a better candidate. Want to apply? Send us a demo website of your skills to EliVanV2010@hotmail.com along with your application.
